title: Thamirabarani Lyrics Nedunchalai Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Thamirabarani
Singer(s): C.Sathya
Movie: Nedunchalai
Music: C.Sathya
Lyrics: Karthik Netha		 .
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Thamirabarani neeril neendhi vandhaen
yen aavaam pooilaye
Aayiram kanava ne vedhachiputtu
kai veesi poravale
Karuppi kaattukulla molacha nella pola
morattu nejukulla mutti vandhu molacha
edhuku kuthavacha manasa pathavacha
kosuvam pola pinnavacha mudi
adiye perukaan muzhiye
adiye uruvaachurukke

Pathu pannirendu manivara naanum
kandavazhi thirinjaen
pottapulla iva paathutu ponaa
ottukulla adanjen

Otha thuni mattum pozhudhukum uduthi
ishtapadi kedandhaen
ottuthanni iva sirichittu ponaa
eight-u mura kulichen

Maruthaani ela pola
en manasa kasakura
arukaani azhagaathaan en
usura kudikkuraa
Raatina thooriya pola enna
adi yendi urula vitta

POllaachi sootu thachi
kankaachi paakayila
annaasi pazham pola
enna vetti thinna adiye

Sallipaya iva manasula neethaan
malli chediya vacha
otta kaasu enna urupidiyaaki
nenju kuzhyil vacha
adi podi unna paarthaa
oru kiruku pidikudhey
thala mela oru megam
thammuti adikudhey
kozhiya pola en urakatha nee
adi verasa muzhunguriye

Vithaaraa kalli unna
kothaaga alli vandhu
pothaana pottu chinna
nenjukulla pootta varavaa
thaniye thaniye
aruvaa mizhungum vizhiyeEnglish Translation
I tried my best :)
[english lyric]
